Recommendations: The core collections with current editions of books and other materials may be continuously enhanced.
The number of volumes of the collections per curricular need to conform with the standards set forth in academic programs may be increased.
A library integrated system that generates all the necessary services and facilitates the organization of the resources may be considered.
The administration may consider installing a security and monitoring system such as cctv, door detector and concave mirror.
An additional air-conditioning units may be installed in the reading areas of the library to make the place more conducive to learning.
